DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Cancer Pathologic Regional Lymph Nodes TNM Positive Finding Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text statement to describe the extent of the pathologic spread of prostate cancer (pN) to indicate the level of regional lymph node involvement that is present on pathologic evaluation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Cancer Pathologic Regional Lymph Nodes TNM Positive Finding
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of prostate cancer, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of regional lymph nodes.  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)_Confirmation of something, such as a positive lab test. In medicine, a positive lab test indicates the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism. (NCI)_The result of an examination or inquiry.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Prostate Cancer Pathologic Regional Lymph Nodes TNM Finding v7
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of prostate cancer, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of regional lymph nodes.  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer Pathologic Regional Lymph Nodes TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: A pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of prostate cancer, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of regional lymph nodes.  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Property.preferredDefinition: Confirmation of something, such as a positive lab test. In medicine, a positive lab test indicates the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism. (NCI):The result of an examination or inquiry.

The result of an examination or inquiry.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Prostate Cancer Pathologic Regional Lymph Nodes TNM Finding Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of prostate cancer, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of regional lymph nodes.  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)_The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer with involvement of regional lymph nodes. (from AJCC 6th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pN1 TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer with metastases in regional node(s).  (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Prostate cancer with no positive regional nodes. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

Concepts.longName: Prostate Cancer pN0 TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Prostate cancer with no positive regional nodes. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

(from AJCC 7th Ed.):The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

Concepts.definition: A pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of prostate cancer, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of regional lymph nodes.  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)
The extent of a cancer in the body.
